## 1. Summary
The chat segment contains brief technical discussions about model exports, file format conversions, and debugging tools. Highlander mentions issues with exporting from Miximo without skin, importing to Blender, and exporting as .glb format. Shiffty shares converted emotes for Hyperfy. Teknopath proposes creating a PR for server error logs to enable remote debugging functionality, mentioning specific methods like getErrors(), getStats(), and clearErrors() with a buffer setup for automated debugging tools. Marlus asks about fixing a build error on Digital Ocean that another user had previously encountered.

## 2. FAQ
Q: How can I fix issues with exporting from Miximo without skin, importing to Blender, and exporting as .glb? (asked by highlander) A: Unanswered
Q: Would it be ok if I set up a PR for asking the server about error logs for remote debugging? (asked by teknopath) A: Unanswered
Q: What did you do to fix the build error on Digital Ocean? (asked by marlus) A: Unanswered

## 3. Help Interactions
Helper: Shiffty | Helpee: (community) | Context: Needed Hyperfy emotes in the correct format | Resolution: Shared converted emotes in the proper format for Hyperfy via a Discord link

## 4. Action Items
Type: Technical | Description: Create PR for server error logs (getErrors(), getStats(), clearErrors()) for remote debugging | Mentioned By: teknopath
Type: Technical | Description: Fix model export issues from Miximo to .glb format | Mentioned By: highlander
